Welcome to Pediatric Dental Associates! Welcome to the website of Pediatric Dental Associates, with five convenient locations in Birmingham, Cullman, Hoover, Oxford, and Pell City, Alabama. At Pediatric Dental Associates, excellence in patient care is our number one priority. We pride ourselves on providing high quality dental care to our patients, and with years of experience working with kids, our pediatric dentists and seasoned team of pediatric dental expert staff know how to make every trip to our office fun and enjoyable for the whole family. Thank you for your interest in our practice. We hope to see you soon at Pediatric Dental Associates!
Welcome to Birmingham Pediatric Associates! We are a pediatric practice in Birmingham, AL. We look forward to serving your family!

Dr. Winkler graduated from Milligan College in 1984 with a B.S. degree in Biology and Mathematics. She went on to obtain a Masters Degree in Mathematics from the University of South Carolina in 1986 and subsequently taught college mathematics. She then attended medical school at the University of South Carolina and completed her MD degree in 1991. Dr. Winkler completed her internship and residency at the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences in 1994. She subsequently went on to pursue training in Pediatric Critical Care Medicine at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. She completed this training in 1997 and moved to Lexington, Kentucky where she was an Assistant Professor in Pediatric Critical Care Medicine from 1997 – 2000. In 2000 Dr. Winkler returned to Birmingham and went on to lead the Pediatric Critical Care Division at the Children’s Hospital of Alabama. She is board certified in Pediatrics and Pediatric Critical Care Medicine. She is a Fellow of the American Academy of Pediatrics and a Fellow of the Society for Critical Care Medicine. She loves living in Birmingham and is excited about joining Southlake Pediatrics as she transitions into the primary care setting for the next phase of her career.

Dr. Wamack joined Birmingham Pediatrics in 1990 after completing his residency at Vanderbilt University Childrenâ??s Hospital, where he was Chief Resident, 1989-1990. In addition to his practice, he has served as Chief of Services for the Department of Pediatrics at St. Vincentâ??s Hospital since 2001. Prior to residency, he attended high school locally at Vestavia Hills High School, graduated with honors from Harding University majoring in Chemistry, and attended medical school at The University of Alabama School of Medicine in Birmingham. He is board-certified in pediatrics and is a Fellow of the American Academy of Pediatrics. He and his wife Jeanne live in Vestavia Hills and have two children, Hunter and Catherine.

Birmingham Minimally Invasive Surgery is a purpose built facility for the surgical management of general surgical and bariatric conditions. Minimally Invasive Surgery means "Less Pain" and "Faster Recovery". Our website features information on common conditions, diagnoses, screening, and common treatments involved in our practice. Specific information is included on Hernia, Gallstones, Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD), Hepatomegaly, Splenomegaly, Inguinal Hernia, Obesity, Appendicitis, Pancreatitis, Hepatitis, Esophagitis, Endoscopy, Laparoscopic (Key Hole) Surgery, Obesity Surgery, LAP-BAND, and much more.

Business Name: Southlake Orthopaedics Sports Medicine & Spine Center PC
Business Information: Dr. Thomas E. Powell, Dr. Dewey H. Jones III, and Dr. Dewey H. Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. Our doctors offer compassionate orthopedic care and spend ample time listening to their patients to develop customized surgical and non-surgical solutions for relieving pain, stiffness, swelling, and movement limitations. Our physicians are truly dedicated to their craft, treating people with general orthopedic conditions such as fractures, sports injuries, work-related injuries, and joint disease. In addition to performing arthroscopy, joint replacement surgery, and general orthopedic surgery, our surgeons perform surgery for the foot, ankle, hip, knee, shoulder, elbow, and wrist. Some of our physicians also administer ultrasound-guided medication injections to help relieve joint pain.

Henderson & Walton Women's Center P.C. is a health care center. The medical facility offers a number of services for bone density non-stress testing, fetal monitoring, nutritional counseling, infertility assessment and mammography, among others. It also deals in ultrasound checking, obstetrics and gynecological treatments. Henderson & Walton Women's Center P.C. also conducts cholesterol/glucose testing, urinalysis and insemination. The health care center accepts insurance from Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Alabama, MetraHealth Railroad Retirees, United Healthcare Senior Partners and Humana Choice Care, among others.

Located in Birmingham, Ala., Grayson and Associates is one of the largest groups of mental health clinicians in the United States. Established in 1985, the company has more than 50 clinicians and is one of the largest private practice providing mental health services to children, adolescents, and adults in Alabama. It offers a wide range of services, such as psychotherapy services, diagnostic testing, educational services, hospitalization, business consultations, sex therapy, couple therapy and neuropsychological evaluation.

Business Information: Total Skin & Beauty Dermatology Center is a full-service clinic to treat skin disease. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the clinic comprises the medical center, the surgical center, the phototherapy center, the aesthetic center for cosmetic and laser surgery and the research center. The firm carry a wide assortment of skin care products, such as La Roche-Posay Toleriane soothing protective care, La Roche-Posay Hydraphase Riche, nutritic emulsion 2.5%, elta MD moisturizer, elta MD ultra violet daily sun protection formula 40 and many more.

Heritage Medicine is a new concept medical clinic located in Birmingham, AL. We are conveniently located on Highway 280 close to the Greystone Community of Hoover. We practice Family and Preventive Medicine along with Medically Supervised Weight Loss, Aesthetics (BOTOX, Juvederm, etc), LED Light Therapy to treat various skin disorders (Acne, Eczema, Psoriasis, Wrinkles, Fine Lines and Hair Loss) and sell top brand vitamin and supplements.

Birmingham Obstetrics & Gynecology specializes in preconceptual counseling, adolescent gynecology and counseling. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the clinic offers a series of services, including infertility treatment, high-risk obstetrical care and prenatal care. It also performs bone density tests and fitness tests and also offers diet counseling, urodynamic testing and major/minor gynecological surgeries. Birmingham Obstetrics & Gynecology is equipped with state-of-the-art 4-D ultrasound technology. Its physicians are affiliated with the St. Vincent s Birmingham and Outpatient CareCenter.

OrthoSports Associates provides orthopedic care at the highest standard. We offer our patients one-on-one care in modern, state-of-the-art facilities. Our team of physicians work with you to determine the best, most conservative treatment approach and assist you in seeking a treatment plan that maintains your independence, dignity and a maximum level of function. With international training, institutional-level experience, and a multitude of publications, our doctors bring world-class expertise to the Greater Birmingham area.

Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a practice serving the residents of Birmingham, Ala. and surrounding areas. The practice performs surgery at multiple sites including five local hospitals and outpatient operations at its AAAASF (American Association for Accreditation of Ambulatory Surgery Facilities) nationally accredited office-based surgical facility. It provides colon and rectal surgical care along with colonoscopy and transrectal ultrasound services. Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute (ACRI) is a national preceptor for Ethicon on two procedures (PPH for hemorrhoids and STARR for obstructive defecation syndrome).

Founded in 1999, Sharp & Stone OB/GYN, P.C. is a gynecology practice located in Birmingham, Ala. The center offers a range of services, such as pregnancy planning, pregnancy and infertility related advice, high-risk pregnancy consulting, gynecologic exams and pap smears, breast exams and treatment for abnormal uterine bleeding. The center also offers consultation in matters, such as heavy menses, painful menses, uterine fibroids, pelvic prolapse, pelvic pain, urinary incontinence, hysterectomy and menopause. Sharp & Stone OB/GYN, P.C. is a member of the American College of Obstetricians & Gynecologists.

He received his undergraduate degree with honors from Harvard University and his medical degree with honors from the Syracuse College of Medicine at the State University of New York. His specialty training in ophthalmology was done at Vanderbilt University, followed by a 2 year ASOPRS fellowship in oculoplastic, orbital, and reconstructive surgery at UAB Medical Center and The Callahan Eye Foundation Hospital. Dr. Vicinanzo is certified by the American Board of Ophthalmology and is a diplomat of the American Academy of Ophthalmology. For over 50 years, Urology Centers of Alabama, P.C. has been providing personalized medical care specializing in treating urological disorders using the advanced technology. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the surgery center conducts medical procedures, such as radioactive seed implantation, robotic surgery and endoscopic and laser surgery using the state-of-the-art facility. It provides complete medical care and treatment for diseases and disorders of the entire urinary system, including stone disease, male impotence, urinary incontinence, prostrate cancer, kidney diseases, among others. Technology used comprises ultrasound imaging, computerized axial tomography scans, radiation technology and x-ray.

For more than 50 years, Urology Centers of Alabama P.C. has been serving the community of Alabama. Located in Homewood, Ala., the center provides medical and surgical treatments for a series diseases and disorders. The urology clinic treats entire urinary system, such as diseases of the kidneys, bladder, prostate, testicles, cancer of the urinary system, prostate cancer, male impotence/infertility, male and female urinary tract infections, stone disease and urinary incontinence. Its specialty medical services include minimally invasive surgery, endoscopic surgery, ultrasound, vasectomy and radiation therapy.

For more than 50 years, Urology Centers of Alabama P.C. has been serving the community of Alabama. Norwood Clinic, established in 1925 and based in Birmingham, Ala., is one of the largest privately owned multispecialty medical group practices in Alabama. The clinic has more than 40 physicians practicing in over 20 primary care, medical and surgical specialties. Its specialty areas include bone mineral density testing, cardiac surgery, family medicine, gastroenterology, internal medicine, nephrology, neurosurgery and occupational medicine. The specialty areas also include ophthalmology, pathology, podiatric medicine, pulmonary diseases, radiology and diagnostic imaging, rheumatology, surgery, urology, vascular surgery, and wound care and hyperbarics. Norwood Clinic additionally maintains several affiliated practice sites serving northern Alabama. The clinic s specialists also travel to more than 15 sites throughout Birmingham and northern Alabama.

Outpatient Services East, located in Birmingham, Ala., and established in 1985, is a multispecialty center that provides health care services. It offers surgical procedures in various areas, such as general, gynecology, orthopedics, plastic, and ear, nose and throat surgery. Additionally, it provides endoscopic procedures, such as colonoscopy, dilatations and biopsies. Outpatient Services East also offers eye treatment, including cataract removal, laser surgery and blepharoplasty with the aid of ophthalmologists. The center also provides urologic surgery, cystoscopy, vasectomy, hydrocele repairs and circumcision. Additionally it provides neurologic surgery and pain management services. The center is a more than 25,000-square-foot facility and offers various rooms. It is approved by the Joint Commission on Accreditation of Healthcare Organizations.

Don't wait to get the important care you need. When you need care, Ascension is committed to keeping you safe while you're receiving it. Our hospitals and clinics have implemented safety precautions to protect our patients and our care teams. From screening our associates to rigorous cleaning and disinfecting procedures, we are balancing care with caution. Call to discuss the right option for your care and to learn more about specific safety and visitor guidelines.

John A. Long has practiced oculoplastic surgery in Birmingham since 1988. His practice is limited to cosmetic and reconstructive surgery of the eyelids, orbits and lacrimal system. Dr. Long received his medical degree from the University of Iowa in 1983 and completed his internship in Wisconsin. Specialty training in ophthalmology was done at the University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA). Following the completion of his residency in 1987, Dr. Long completed a fellowship in oculoplastic and reconstructive surgery at UCLA. Dr. Long is active in both the practice of oculoplastic surgery and the teaching of the art and science of his subspecialty at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. He is an Associate Clinical Professor of Ophthalmology at UAB and participates in the training of ophthalmologists. Dr. Long serves as one of the preceptors for a fellowship sponsored by the American Society of Ophthalmic and Reconstructive Surgery (ASOPRS). The current fellow is Shannon G. Cox, M.D. Dr. Long has recently published a book on oculoplastic surgery. He has written numerous papers, published chapters and has given talks around the world on various topics in oculoplastic surgery. Dr. Long is certified by the American Board of Ophthalmology, is a member of the American Society of Oculoplastic and Reconstructive Surgery, American Society of Cosmetic Surgery and a Fellow of the American College of Surgeons. Dr. Long has been elected to Best Doctors in America for many years in a row. Dr. Long is a leader in the field of oculoplastic and reconstructive surgery. Visit his website at www.eyelid-doc.com.

The Division of Preventive Medicine has been providing medicines for prevention and control of disease outcomes since 1967. It provides medicine for cancer control, chronic diseases, including cardiovascular, diabetes and obesity. It is a research-oriented division of the UAB Department of Medicine. Its cancer prevention control program reduces cancer incidence, morbidity and mortality and also provides research training for graduate students, postdoctoral fellows and junior faculty. The division s addiction and homelessness program provides treatment for patients suffering with AIDS and substance-related disorders and improves drug addiction treatment settings. Its behavioral science program develops treatment strategies to promote mental and physical health. The Division of Preventive Medicine is an administrative office in Birmingham, Ala.

Retina Specialists of Alabama, LLC 
The physicians wish you a warm welcome to our website and to our practice. The associates of the practice are Board Certified Ophthalmologists with subspecialty fellowship training in vitreoretinal surgery. Because we know that for most people seeing a retina specialist is a new and may be an anxious experience, both physicians and staff are dedicated to serving you with respect and empathy. This site lets you start to get to know us and know what to expect. It can be the beginning of an education process that gives you the tools to be an active participant in restoring and preserving the health of your eyes.

At Excel ENT of Alabama, we specialize in providing both adult and pediatric care for a variety of Ear, Nose, and Throat conditions, such as sinusitis, ear disorders, hearing loss, and throat and voice disorders. In addition, we offer custom-fitted hearing aids in the Homewood area to improve your hearing and quality of life. Contact us today to schedule an appointment with our experienced ENT team.

Helping practices provide higher quality patient care resulting in better health outcomes. Complete Health is a physician-driven, professionally managed, technology-enabled primary care group delivering unrivaled quality, support service, and outcomes. Value-based care benefits for Medicare patients are at the core of the Complete Health primary care philosophy of providing a better health care approach to aging.  
 
Connecting patients to cutting-edge treatment. Patients’ needs are unique, and the Complete Health family of providers recognizes that there is value in offering a breadth of treatments and services, preventive ancillary services and clinical research. Our investment in a team of knowledgeable professionals and state of the art equipment leads to personalized attention, uncompromising quality, and outstanding patient care.

Founded in 1946, CardioVascular Associates is one of the largest cardiology group practices in the Southeast. It has a staff of more than 25 cardiologists that offers cardiovascular diagnosis and treatment services. The facility specializes in positron emission and electron beam computed tomography services. CardioVascular Associates, also known as CVA, provides cardiac stress testing, outpatient cardiac catheterization, nuclear medicine imaging and ultrasound diagnostic services. It conducts stress echo, geneaology and nuclear stress tests, as well as renal artery duplex and abdominal aorta ultrasound imaging services. The facility specializes in holter and cardiac event monitoring, defribillator and pacemaker implantation, angioplasty, stent placement, directional atherectomy and brachytherapy treatments. It conducts clinical research trials in the areas of acute coronary syndromes, chronic stable angina, congestive heart failure, hyperlipidemia, hypertension, peripheral artery disease and restenosis. CardioVascular Associates is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Located in Birmingham, Ala., Brookwood Medical Group, P.C. specializes in providing health care services. It treats numerous diseases, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, thyroid problems, infectious diseases, heart disease, emphysema and cancer. The medical center offers a plethora of services, such as include cancer screening tests, women's health care, chronic care management, nerve conduction studies, smoking cessation, urinalysis and echocardiograms, to name a few. Brookwood Medical Group, P.C. has affiliations with Brookwood Medical Center.

Business Name: Children's of Alabama - Pediatric ENT Associates
Business Information: Pediatric ENT Associates is a group of doctors that specialize in diagnosis and treatment of pediatric ear, nose, and throat conditions. Our doctors use the Children's of Alabama hospital as an outpatient center. From obstructive sleep apnea to hearing loss, our physicians have the experience and skills to diagnose and develop the best individual treatment plan for your child. If you have any questions for Pediatric ENT Associates, please contact our expert staff today.

The Kirklin Clinic at Acton Road is a medical facility that offers diagnosis and treatment services for cancer. It provides an array of patient care services, including radiation treatment, infusion therapy and plastic surgery. The clinic also offers ear, nose and throat related, head and neck surgery, surgical oncology and urology services. The Kirklin Clinic at Acton Road additionally provides obstetric services for mothers who have diabetes, high blood pressure, Rh problems, and heart, lung, kidney and vascular diseases. It maintains an on-site laboratory. The Kirklin Clinic at Acton Road is a member of the UAB Health System, which operates several hospitals and clinics in Alabama. The clinic is located in Birmingham, Ala.

BodyLogicMD is a network of certified physicians specializing in bioidentical hormone replacement therapy and integrative medicine. They provide personalized treatment plans that combine conventional medicine with alternative and complementary treatments to address the root cause of health concerns. With a focus on treating the whole person, rather than just the symptoms, BodyLogicMD helps patients achieve optimal health and wellness.

Business Information: Children’s of Alabama has provided specialized medical care for ill and injured children across the state and throughout the southeastern U.S. since 1911. For the past three years, Children’s has been ranked among the best children’s hospital programs in the nation by US News & World Report. Last year, patients made more than 634,000 outpatient and nearly 14,000 inpatient visits to Children’s from every county in Alabama and from 47 other states. With more than 2 million square feet, it is the third largest pediatric medical facility in the U.S. Children’s offers inpatient and outpatient services across its Russell Campus on Birmingham’s historic Southside with additional outpatient services provided at Children’s South and Children’s on 3rd. Primary care is provided at more than a dozen medical offices in communities across central Alabama. Children’s of Alabama is the only medical center in Alabama dedicated solely to the care and treatment of children. It is a private, not-for-profit medical center that serves as the primary site of the University of Alabama at Birmingham (UAB) pediatric medicine, surgery, research and residency programs. Children’s recently moved much of its inpatient services into a new building named The Benjamin Russell Hospital for Children.

From its beginning in 1965, OB/GYN Associates of Alabama has offered the Birmingham commu­nity the highest quality women's health care ser­vices. Even as our practice has grown, we have not outgrown our priorities: Strive for Medical Excellence Be Sensitive to the Needs of You our Patient Provide Convenient Locations and Services As OB/GYN Associates of Alabama continues to expand into new and exciting frontiers, our vision remains focused on providing quality care, sensitivity and understanding, professional counseling and educational information for women of all ages, throughout all stages of your life.|Year Established: 1965.

OB-GYN South offers a range of medical and health care services. It practices in the areas of gynecology and obstetrics. The company provides surgical evaluation and laboratory and radiologic testing solutions. OB-GYN South also offers services for abdomen, buttock, pelvis, vulva and vagina pains. It provides endometrial and resection, diagnostic laparoscopy solutions. The company additionally offers inguinal, ventral, sciatic, obturator, perineal and spigelian hernia repair services. OB-GYN South provides ureterolysis, vaginal vault suspension, enterocele repair and xenograft placement solutions. The company offers services in the fields of laparoscopic hysterectomy, myomectomy, oophoropexy and appendectomy. In addition, it accepts several insurance plans.
ACRI is a 4 physician office of colon and rectal surgeons. We specialize in all facets of colon and rectal surgery including anorectal and laparoscopic surgery and colonoscopy. www.acripc.com

Our physicians specialize in medical oncology and hematology. Each physician is board certified in internal medicine, hematology and medical oncology. Cancer treatments often require treatment by multiple physicians in different specialties.  While we specialize in medical oncology, we work closely with specialists in other areas, including surgery and radiation oncology to help coordinate an optimal treatment plan. Our office offers a large amount of patient support, easy access to triage for problems, timely appointments with flexible scheduling, financial advisors and more within our clinic. We believe we provide unparalleled access to start of the art cancer treatment combined with accessible personalized care.

Psych Wellness South LLC offers a professional and personalized mental health services in a quiet, friendly and supportive environment. Our psychiatrists and psychologist have many years of experience.  Psych Wellness provides comprehensive psychiatric and psychological evaluations, medication management, psychological testing and therapy sessions. Dr. Winkler graduated from Milligan College in 1984 with a B.S. degree in Biology and Mathematics. She went on to obtain a Masters Degree in Mathematics from the University of South Carolina in 1986 and subsequently taught college mathematics. She then attended medical school at the University of South Carolina and completed her MD degree in 1991. Dr. Winkler completed her internship and residency at the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences in 1994. She subsequently went on to pursue training in Pediatric Critical Care Medicine at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. She completed this training in 1997 and moved to Lexington, Kentucky where she was an Assistant Professor in Pediatric Critical Care Medicine from 1997 – 2000. In 2000 Dr. Winkler returned to Birmingham and went on to lead the Pediatric Critical Care Division at the Children’s Hospital of Alabama. She is board certified in Pediatrics and Pediatric Critical Care Medicine. She is a Fellow of the American Academy of Pediatrics and a Fellow of the Society for Critical Care Medicine. She loves living in Birmingham and is excited about joining Southlake Pediatrics as she transitions into the primary care setting for the next phase of her career.

Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. John A. Long has practiced oculoplastic surgery in Birmingham since 1988. His practice is limited to cosmetic and reconstructive surgery of the eyelids, orbits and lacrimal system. Dr. Long received his medical degree from the University of Iowa in 1983 and completed his internship in Wisconsin. Specialty training in ophthalmology was done at the University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA). Following the completion of his residency in 1987, Dr. Long completed a fellowship in oculoplastic and reconstructive surgery at UCLA. Dr. Long is active in both the practice of oculoplastic surgery and the teaching of the art and science of his subspecialty at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. He is an Associate Clinical Professor of Ophthalmology at UAB and participates in the training of ophthalmologists. Dr. Long serves as one of the preceptors for a fellowship sponsored by the American Society of Ophthalmic and Reconstructive Surgery (ASOPRS). The current fellow is Shannon G. Cox, M.D. Dr. Long has recently published a book on oculoplastic surgery. He has written numerous papers, published chapters and has given talks around the world on various topics in oculoplastic surgery. Dr. Long is certified by the American Board of Ophthalmology, is a member of the American Society of Oculoplastic and Reconstructive Surgery, American Society of Cosmetic Surgery and a Fellow of the American College of Surgeons. Dr. Long has been elected to Best Doctors in America for many years in a row. Dr. Long is a leader in the field of oculoplastic and reconstructive surgery. Visit his website at www.eyelid-doc.com.

The Division of Preventive Medicine has been providing medicines for prevention and control of disease outcomes since 1967. It provides medicine for cancer control, chronic diseases, including cardiovascular, diabetes and obesity. It is a research-oriented division of the UAB Department of Medicine. Its cancer prevention control program reduces cancer incidence, morbidity and mortality and also provides research training for graduate students, postdoctoral fellows and junior faculty. The division s addiction and homelessness program provides treatment for patients suffering with AIDS and substance-related disorders and improves drug addiction treatment settings. Its behavioral science program develops treatment strategies to promote mental and physical health. The Division of Preventive Medicine is an administrative office in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1946, CardioVascular Associates is one of the largest cardiology group practices in the Southeast. It has a staff of more than 25 cardiologists that offers cardiovascular diagnosis and treatment services. The facility specializes in positron emission and electron beam computed tomography services. CardioVascular Associates, also known as CVA, provides cardiac stress testing, outpatient cardiac catheterization, nuclear medicine imaging and ultrasound diagnostic services. It conducts stress echo, geneaology and nuclear stress tests, as well as renal artery duplex and abdominal aorta ultrasound imaging services. The facility specializes in holter and cardiac event monitoring, defribillator and pacemaker implantation, angioplasty, stent placement, directional atherectomy and brachytherapy treatments. It conducts clinical research trials in the areas of acute coronary syndromes, chronic stable angina, congestive heart failure, hyperlipidemia, hypertension, peripheral artery disease and restenosis. CardioVascular Associates is located in Birmingham, Ala.
